text: Patrick Harvie (born 18 March 1973) is a Scottish politician. He is a co- leader of the Scottish Green Party. He is the leader of the party in the Scottish Parliament. The other co-leader is Lorna Slater. He became a Member of the Scottish Parliament (MSP) for the Glasgow region at the elections in May 2003. He was first elected co-convener of the Scottish Green Party in 2008. ==References== ==Other websites== *Patrick Harvie's page at the Scottish Parliament Website *Patrick Harvie on Scottish Greens website *Patrick Harvie's website Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish Parliament Members Category:Greens politicians Category:Politicians from Glasgow
title: Patrick Harvie
